title: Determine Your Budget
description: Before you start car shopping, set a realistic budget. Consider not only the purchase price but also ongoing expenses like insurance, fuel, and maintenance.

title: Research Car Models
description: Research different car models from the brands we offer, and compare their features, performance, and prices. Look for the one that meets your needs.

title: Consider New vs. Used
description: Decide whether you want a new or used car. New cars may have the latest features, but used cars can be more affordable. Consider your priorities.

title: Test Drive and Inspect
description: Always test drive a car before buying. Pay attention to comfort, handling, and features. Also, have a trusted mechanic inspect a used car.

title: Negotiate and Review Terms
description: Negotiate the price with the seller or dealer. Carefully review the terms of the sale, including warranties, financing, and any additional costs.
